jd: From: Rakesh, Blue Ocean Ventures rakesh.d@blue-oceanventures.com Reply to: rakesh.d@blue-oceanventures.com As a Lead .Net Developer with GCP, you will be a part of an Agile team to build healthcare applications and implement new features while adhering to the best coding development standards.
